welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dearborn, where the rich history of the Ford Motor Company meets the charm of a vibrant, diverse community. As you explore our city, take in the renowned Henry Ford Museum and immerse yourself in our welcoming neighborhoods and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: LaPita
restaurants.description: LaPita is a middle eastern restaurant located in Dearborn.
restaurants.address: 22681 Newman St (at Haigh St.), Dearborn, MI 48124

restaurants.name: Iversen's Express
restaurants.description: Iversen's Express is a bakery located in Dearborn.

restaurants.name: Tropical Smoothie Cafe
restaurants.description: Tropical Smoothie Cafe is a café located in Dearborn.

restaurants.name: O'Sushi Japanese Restaurant
restaurants.description: O'Sushi Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Dearborn.
restaurants.address: 22431 Michigan Ave (at S Military St.), Dearborn, MI 48124

restaurants.name: Sahara Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sahara Restaurant is a mediterranean restaurant located in Dearborn.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per session, with option to purchase extended access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Detroit City Airport serves international flights and offers a variety of amenities for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
